question: 怎么得到randomforestregressor里每棵树的预测结果？
description: 我在sklearn里用了30棵树的randomforestregressor，按照原理来说，我应该得到了30个单独的数值预测结果。怎么获得随机森林中每棵树的预测结果呢？

answers.lvl1_answer:
estimators_[k]可以得到第k棵树

model = RandomForestRegressor(n_estimators=3)
model.fit(X, Y)
tree0, tree1, tree2 = model.estimators_[0], model.estimators_[1], model.estimators_[2] 
pred0 = tree0.predict(X)
pred1 = tree1.predict(X)
pred2 = tree2.predict(X)
